mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article (title, subtitle, userId, imgUrl, articleTypeId, editorValue, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleType.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editorValue},#{createTime}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: update tb_article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgUrl = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, articleTypeId = #{articleType.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, editorValue = #{editorValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.subtitle subtitle, a.imgUrl imgUrl, b.id userId, b.name userName, b.nickname userNickName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c WHERE a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.imgUrl imgUrl, a.subtitle subtitle, b.id userId, b.name userName, b.nickname userNickName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c
a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id
AND ( a.title LIKE "%"#{_parameter}"%" or a.subtitle LIKE "%"#{_parameter}"%" or b.name LIKE "%"#{_parameter}"%" or c.type LIKE "%"#{_parameter}"%" )

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.imgUrl imgUrl, a.subtitle subtitle, b.id userId, b.name userName, b.nickname userNickName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c
a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id
AND ( a.title LIKE "%"#{condition}"%" or a.subtitle LIKE "%"#{condition}"%" or b.name LIKE "%"#{condition}"%" or c.type LIKE "%"#{condition}"%" )
AND a.articleTypeId = #{articleTypeId}
AND str_to_date(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND str_to_date(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.subtitle subtitle, b.id userId, b.name userName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c WHERE a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id AND a.userId = #{id}

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.subtitle subtitle, a.imgUrl imgUrl, b.id userId, b.name userName, b.nickname userNickName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c where a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id AND isCarousel = 1

SELECT a.id id, a.title title, a.subtitle subtitle, a.imgUrl, b.id userId, b.name userName, b.nickname userNickName, a.editorValue editorValue, c.id articleTypeId, c.type articleTypeName, a.gmt_create createTime, a.gmt_modified modifiedTime FROM tb_article a, tb_user b, tb_article_type c where a.userId = b.id AND a.articleTypeId = c.id AND isCarousel = 0 AND str_to_date(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND curdate()
SELECT id,title,subtitle,gmt_create createTime,imgUrl FROM tb_article WHERE articleTypeId = #{articleTypeId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
